name: Spooky Romance Times
description:
You are in a house.

It is haunted by two monsters.

Will you date them? Will you kill them? Only you can decide!

(like one of those Choose-Your-Own-Adventure Goosebumps books that always left you feeling weirdly unsatisfied, except it's got PG13 content: cw for blood, murder, violence, possession, kissing, etc. basically not serious at all.)
